definition: to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: It is excellent to carve as it hardly splinters at all.
sentences.chinese: 对于雕刻件它是极好的，因为它几乎不碎裂。

sentences.english: The ice on the river begins to break up when spring comes.
sentences.chinese: 春天来了，河上的冰开始碎裂。

sentences.english: The voice of ground crack comes from Shu's the son in the vacant land medium.
sentences.chinese: 碎裂的声音，来自竖在空地中间的那根木头桩子。

sentences.english: The papyrus was already beginning to crumble, so he did not dare touch it by hand.
sentences.chinese: 这些纸草已经开始碎裂，所以他不敢用手去碰它们。

sentences.english: Aim To study the effects of two repairing methods on unilateral kidney rupture.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察肾碎裂伤后两种修补方法的疗效。

sentences.english: In spring the ice- floes break up.
Smashed, mix his heart's blood with the mire of the land.
sentences.chinese: 碎裂了，他心脏的血与地上的泥泞混在一起。

sentences.english: Grim cement buildings covered in peeling paint rise from the cracked pavement.
sentences.chinese: 水泥建筑外墙上的油漆已经剥落，地面也斑驳碎裂。

sentences.english: They changed colour, but did not break.
sentences.chinese: 它们变了颜色但却没有碎裂。

sentences.english: Supersaturation can also cause the dryer to disintegrate and contaminate the air-conditioning from inside.
sentences.chinese: 湿气过于饱和也会导致干燥器碎裂并弄脏空调内部。

sentences.english: The shear cliff at Yosemite is an example of such rock breakage.
sentences.chinese: 优胜美地的断崖就是这样一种岩石碎裂的例子。

sentences.english: Shred lightning and rayl, the bear is a taker.
sentences.chinese: 如碎裂的闪电和轰雷一声，巨熊显然是个掠夺者。

sentences.english: The latter contains well-consolidated structural breccia, cataclastic and mylonitic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 后者则包括固结较好的构造角砾岩，碎裂岩和糜棱岩。

sentences.english: A broken coffee cup is on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 地板上有一个碎裂的咖啡杯。

sentences.english: An indoor model test is carried out on rock mass of cracked structure reinforced by the bolt.
sentences.chinese: 针对锚杆加固后的碎裂结构岩体进行了室内模型试验。

sentences.english: If you add too much borax the mixture will be crumbly and fall apart.
sentences.chinese: 如果加太多硼砂，混合物会因为太脆而容易碎裂。

definition: to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to destroy in an explosion/to break (by bombing)
all split up and in pieces (idiom); disunity (in an organization)/complete lack of unity/to disintegrate/falling apart/to be at sixes and sevens
